reviews.review:
Okay this is my first review so I guess we will see what happens. 

So starting off on this game, when you first buy it, you have butterflies like no other, your telling your friends how excited you are, you've watched Youtube videos on it, blah blah blah. You hop on for the first time and then you join a casual, first... you learn how toxic and funny the game-chat/voice-chat is, second you learn how dog sh-t you are at the game, then you decide you want to be come better at the game so you hop in a competitive game and learn how fun it is, but you are still dog sh-t. That's because the game sucks at first and is a game that takes time and time and time and time. This game is a love/hate relationship. But in the end it is a great game and I advise you to get it because you make such great memories with strangers and your friends on this game.

Logging off,

Depois que  o jogo ficou gratuito , uma avalanche de hacks começou a deixar o jogo sem graça .
o jogo é bom , mto bom , o problema sao os hacks .

Its fun when u got 4 friends to play with. If not its not worth it to play solo or duo Q youll loose most of the time even if ure a quite decent player and its like gambling to become friendly, mental healthy, english speaking teammates. Especially on EU servers. Not to mention the few hackers, who can easily waste 40 min of ur time. 
In fact when u havent got at least 3 friends to play with every single game, you cant expect to rank up.
